tabs.content:
// This KQL query was generated by AI:
// Create Visualation Dashbaord with all three tables
//
let weatherSeries = weatherapi_realtime_table
| summarize IngestionCount=count() by Time=bin(ingestion_time(), 1h)
| project Time, Table="weatherapi_realtime_table", IngestionCount;
let trafficSeries = traffic_realtime_table
| summarize IngestionCount=count() by Time=bin(ingestion_time(), 1h)
| project Time, Table="traffic_realtime_table", IngestionCount;
let weatherHubSeries = weather_realtimehub
| summarize IngestionCount=count() by Time=bin(ingestion_time(), 1h)
| project Time, Table="weather_realtimehub", IngestionCount;
weatherSeries
| union trafficSeries
| union weatherHubSeries
| order by Time asc
| render timechart 
    with (
        kind=default,
        title="Ingestion Count Trend: All Three Tables (Hourly)",
        xtitle="Time",
        ytitle="Ingestion Count",
        series=Table
    )
